This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Details I work nights so had woke up in the evening. I was up for about 10 mins for some reason I had a feeling to look out the window in my room and I knew for some reason I was going to see somthing. Soon as moved the blinds there was this silver ball flying over my neighborhood. I was surprised by this object I thought at first maybe it was balloon but it has no markings and it was perfectly round. It seemed to pick up speed when I saw it. So I grabbed my camera and ran out front and took some pics of it but it seemed to speed up and gain alltitude till it was to far to dicern in the blue sky. Im not sure what it was..
